title: Schedule Street Sweeping Based on Air Quality Data
description: To combat particulate matter pollution, an operator schedules street sweeping on roads with high dust levels detected by mobile sensors.

tasks.description: Retrieve the latest air quality map, which highlights several streets with high levels of road dust (PM10).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the problem streets from the environmental data.

tasks.description: Generate an optimized route for a street sweeper to clean only the identified high-pollution streets.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a targeted cleaning route.

tasks.description: Create a work order and dispatch the street sweeping crew.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent dispatches the crew with the specific route.
